group_1.textCenter: Crap, that really hurt! What the hell was@that big blast of wind?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't think it was the weather...?

group_1.textRight: In any case, there is a silver lining. We put@some distance between us and the Magius.

group_1.textLeft: So it seems.
Let's make use of this opportunity and meet@up with Iroha, then defeat Eve.

group_1.textRight: Are you all okay?!

group_1.textLeft: Homura...
Did you take care of the Familiars over@there already?

group_1.textRight: I wouldn't say we "took care" of them...@The wind blasted them all away.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks all the same. Having you with us@has been a great help.
We were just about to head for Eve...and@destroy it.
We could really use your assistance.
H-hey, wait a second!
This isn't the time to be discussing that!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what? Why are you yelling at her like@that, Rena?
Weeeh?!
L-l-look everyone, Eve is...!

group_1.textLeft: See?! What'd I tell you?!

group_1.textRight: Sh-sh-she's falling over!

group_1.textLeft: Did it break free?!

group_1.textRight: Everyone, defensive positions! The impact is@going to blast us like it did before!
Ugh! Feels like a building collapsing...

group_1.textLeft: Iroha... Sana...

group_1.textRight: Does this mean the two of them couldn't@stop her?

group_1.textLeft: Wagh! Ugh...damn it. That thing's rampagin'@out of control!

group_1.textRight: Is it heading for Walpurgisnacht? And@therefore...Kamihama?

group_1.textLeft: If it gets all the way down the mountain,@Kamihama will get drowned in curses!

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo! We better get goin' and beat it!

group_1.textLeft: Naturally. I have no intention of allowing@it do that.
Let's get closer to it!

group_1.narration: — Yachiyo —@I knew it was big, but it's another thing@entirely to see it up close...

group_1.textRight: Ugh... What do we do, Yachiyo?!
We need to time our attacks really well when@it's rampaging like this or we're toast!

group_1.textLeft: I agree.
Our enemy is a Witch that could bring about@a stream of landslides, just by falling...
And the Witch that brought this storm here@is Walpurgisnacht.
In other words, we have the ultimate Witches @of earth and sky right here in Kamihama.
*Chuckle*

group_1.textRight: You...

group_1.textLeft: Do you guys get it now?
It doesn't matter how badly you want to stop@Eve from feasting. Toooooo baaaaaad!

group_1.textRight: You struggled against us. What makes you@think you could erase Eve?
You may as well just walk right into Eve's@mouth!

group_1.textLeft: Still, if you want to beat it so badly you're@free to fight it as much as you like.
We'll just watch from the sidelines. We won't@get in your way, promise!
*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: If you're gonna go that far, we'll just beat @it!
Eve's lying quiet for now, so this is the@perfect time to strike!

group_1.textLeft: Besides, it looks like it can't move@right now even if it started flailin' about.

group_1.textRight: Let's BASH its brains out right now! We@won't get another chance like this!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I'm looking forward to making these@little brats cry.

group_1.textRight: You'll regret sitting on your laurels because@underestimated us.

group_1.textLeft: Do it if you can.

group_1.textRight: Let's do this!

group_1.textLeft: *Pant* *Pant* Yachiyo! Everyone! Please...@Don't kill Eve!

group_1.textRight: Hear us out!

group_1.textLeft: Iroha? Sana? I'm glad you're okay, but...

group_1.textRight: Yes, what's the meaning of this? You don't@want us to harm Eve?

group_1.textLeft: We definitely didn't mishear them, that's@for sure.
Do you guys know what you're suggesting?!
A monkey could figure it out at this point!@We have to beat Eve, or we're all screwed!

group_1.textRight: ...You have a reason for not wanting us@to fight it...right?
Pfft... Ah ha ha ha!
This is interesting. Are you seriously@protecting Eve, now?
Must be because of those weird memories of@yours.

group_1.textLeft: Enough talk about Iroha Tamaki.
I get very angry when my frontal lobe and@amygdala are in dispute, you know.

group_1.textRight: Indeed. I can feel rage boiling up within@me, so I'd prefer to avoid the topic.
But that's exactly what it is. It's all got@to do with my memories.

group_1.textLeft: Oh?

group_1.textRight: Eve...used to be Ui.

group_1.textLeft: What? That's a Witch.

group_1.textRight: No, not quite. She may look like a Witch,@but she's really Iroha's little sister!

group_1.textLeft: Can we stop talking about her sister?!
We have no idea who she is. She's a complete@stranger in our books!

group_1.textRight: I concur. Please discuss such frivolous@matters somewhere else.

group_1.narration: — Iroha —@This branch from the Uwasa of the Eternal@Sakura bloomed after Eve touched it.
— Iroha —@Because all four of us reunited at last!
— Iroha —@Me and Touka and Nemu and Ui...@It blossomed because we all met again!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100700:lipSynch_1][chara:100700:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_102001/vo_full_102001-3-91]No way.
So not only did it protect Iroha Tamaki, now@it's in full bloom?

group_1.textRight: The Eternal Sakura will lie dormant until@the time is right for it to bloom.
That is the description I thought up for it@when I created its [textBlue:Rumor].
I don't remember writing a single detail@about it requiring four people to meet.

group_1.textLeft: But the fact remains that it bloomed when@all four of us came together.

group_1.textRight: Because it was predetermined.
If you didn't know us, you couldn't have @decided when the time would be.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder... Does the evidence suffice?
Eve is made up of intense impurities.@Perhaps they exerted their influence...
...causing the [textBlue:Rumor] of the Eternal Sakura@to act oddly.

group_1.textRight: Nemu!

group_1.textLeft: That would be a very strange occurrence, and@certainly difficult to define.
And yet, to me, it is the explanation that@makes the most sense.
Yeah...yeah, you're right!

group_1.textRight: I cannot think of any other reason for it.

group_1.textLeft: Well, then! Too bad for you, Iroha Tamaki.
We aren't going to listen to what a crackpot@like you has to say!

group_1.textRight: Touka! Nemu!

group_1.textLeft: Nope! Talking's all over. You guys work hard@to beat Eve now!
Farewell.
I, Alina, certainly enjoyed this little@charade.
Ha! The thought of it... Me, raising YOUR@little sister all along!
How emozionale. I'm getting goosebumps...
And now, it's time for the show to really get@going.

group_1.textRight: Show...? What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Take a look at Eve. You'll see what I mean.
Ciao!
Howbhib hwihwheeer!

group_1.textRight: Hweh bwharbwhing bwhots ahnd bwhots!

group_1.textLeft: They're all flocking towards the city.

group_1.textRight: Where Walpurgisnacht is coming from?

group_1.textLeft: There are Kamihama Magical Girls stationed@there, so they should take care of things...

group_1.textRight: Are there even enough girls to take care of@that many, though?

group_1.narration: Kamihama is filling up with Familiars.
If we defeat Eve, they'll vanish too...
But I just can't do that...
